server.objects.interfaces

Interface ServerForumInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerForum

    public interface ServerForumInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The server forum interface
    Author:
    Grumpy Group

                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the DiscussionSubject identified by a string title, null otherwise

        Returns:
        DiscussionSubjectInterface - The discussion, null if does not exist

        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • containsPseudo

        boolean containsPseudo(java.lang.String pseudo)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        true if the pseudo in parameters is already used in the connected users list
        Parameters:
        pseudo - String - The pseudonyme
        Returns:
        boolean - true if this pseudo is already used, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • subscribe

        boolean subscribe(DiscussionSubjectInterface dsi,
                ClientDisplayerInterface client)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send a request on the discussion subject to add this user in its list
        Parameters:
        dsi - DiscussionSubjectInterface - The discussion subject
        client - ClientDisplayerInterface - The client to subscribe
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the subscription has been correctly done, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • newUser

        boolean newUser(ClientDisplayerInterface client)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Create an user in the connected users list
        Parameters:
        client - ClientDisplayerInterface - The client to add
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the client has been correctly added, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • broadCast

        boolean broadCast(ClientDisplayerInterface client,
                java.lang.String message)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Send a message to all connected users, from a specific user who does not receive the message. It can be send by the forum server for all users with its client instance
        Parameters:
        client - ClientDisplayerInterface - The client who send the message
        message - String - The message to send
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the message has been correctly sent to others users, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • create

        DiscussionSubjectInterface create(ClientDisplayerInterface client,
                                java.lang.String subject)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Create a channel in the forum list
        Parameters:
        client - ClientDisplayerInterface - The discussion subject author
        subject - String - The channel name
        Returns:
        DiscussionSubjectInterface - The discussion subject if it has been created, null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        int getNumberOfChannel(ClientDisplayerInterface client)

        Returns the number of channel created by the specific user
        Parameters:
        client - DiscussionSubjectInterface - The client displayer
        Returns:
        int - The channels number
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • isFullChannel

        boolean isFullChannel(ClientDisplayerInterface client)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns true if the specific user has the maximum number of created channel
        Parameters:
        client - DiscussionSubjectInterface - The client displayer
        Returns:
        boolean - true if the client has already created the maximum of allowed channels, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        DiscussionSubjectInterface - The discussion subject if it has been removed, null otherwise

                     java.lang.String subject)

        Returns true if the specific user is the author of a specific channel
        Parameters:
        client - DiscussionSubjectInterface - The client displayer
        subject - String - The channel name

        boolean - true if the client is the channel author, false otherwise
